titleStmt.title: A correct copy of some notes concerning Gods decrees especially of reprobation / written for the private use of a friend in Northamptonshire ; and now published to prevent calumny.
titleStmt.author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for R. Royston,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
